subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr., Nascar’s most popular driver, has scheduled a news conference for 11 a.m. Thursday amid speculation about his future with the race team Dale Earnhardt Inc.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr., Nascar’s most popular driver, has scheduled a news conference for 11 a.m. Thursday amid speculation about his future with the race team Dale Earnhardt Inc.
